title: Polo Ralph Lauren 's workforce worldwide 2009 to 2019
summary: Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2012 to 2013.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Number of employees, of value 25000.0 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Number of employees about 17000.0 was reached at Year 2009
